title: Possible Signs That You are No Longer Addicted to League
body:
1. You don't play as much.
2. You can't decide if you should to play League or not during your free time.
3. You don't care if you win or lose
4. You just wanna have fun
5. No more ranked play


These are some things that I am experiencing right now... My addiction to League is over. I no longer enjoy the game as much as I used to. 
If you think I'm missing something, post it in the comment and I'll update the post.
If you feel the same as I am right now, congrats. Your life will change for the better soon.

In all honesty, I'm leaving League because Riot is ruining it to be honest. League of Legends has the potential to be an amazing MOBA but as long as Riot is doing this to League, I'm not sticking around to watch it die.
